Comment.value:
yuan ti will follow player, staying out of combat.  They will revert to their true form and attack if player rests, meets fire giant king, goes to 3Q4H, using true seeing or a similar spell or goes to areas 14 or 1 (the exits to the outside world).

All these conditions will set "NW_G_M3Q04PLOTYUANTI" to 2
revert to Yuan-Ti form and attack
text appears when Yuan-Ti have joined the party

revert to true forms and attack

They will revert to their true form and attack if player rests, meets fire giant king, goes to 3Q4H, using true seeing or a similar spell or goes to areas 14 or 1 (the exits to the outside world).

All these conditions will set "NW_G_M3Q04PLOTYUANTI" to 2  and the Yuan-Ti will init dialog then attack
